abstract: Six current and former female employees sued Citigroup, accusing it of being an “outdated ‘boys club'” that systematically discriminates against women at all levels of the bank.
snippet: Six current and former female employees sued Citigroup, accusing it of being an “outdated ‘boys club'” that systematically discriminates against women at all levels of the bank.
lead_paragraph: 9:37 a.m. | Updated Citigroup reviewed the lawsuit and responded Wednesday evening with a statement addressing the women’s claims.

headline.main: 6 Women Accuse Citigroup of Gender Bias
